alert.note: Alert for Clark; Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 06 at 9:34AM CST until March 06 at 3:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Light Snow Accumulations Today... .Areas of light snow or mixed precipitation will continue into the afternoon. Additional accumulations up to around an inch are expected, especially across Taylor County. Untreated roads may be slick at times. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Taylor and Clark Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.
